item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: How to Get Pure Ice
item.description:
A new expansion for Disney Dreamlight Valley means a whole slew of new content for players to enjoy. From new story quests to villagers, biomes, and crafting recipes, players certainly get their money's worth with every paid expansion that Gameloft releases. Naturally, new biomes mean new resources for players to gather. Whether it is for crafting or quests, there is always a reason to gather every item you discover.

Though it may seem strange, one of the new resources is a gem called Pure Ice, which has nothing to do with the quest item that is part of A Story to Tell. Here is how you can obtain Pure Ice along with what it is used for in Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Storybook Vale .

How to Get Pure Ice

Despite being solid water, Pure Ice is classified as a gem in Disney Dreamlight Valley . There is also a shiny version of Pure Ice as well. Pure Ice can be mined from the large black rocks in all the biomes in Everafter which consists of the Wild Woods, Teapot Falls, the Fallen Fortress, and the Beanstalk Marshes.

In addition to Pure Ice, you also have a chance of getting Star Sapphires while mining in the Everafter as well. If you are looking to farm either gem to have some on hand for later updates, make sure to bring along a character who has mining as their companion role so that you can get extra Pure Ice and Shiny Pure Ice.

What is Pure Ice Used For?

Pure Ice has several uses in Disney Dreamlight Valley . Primarily, it will be used for crafting some of the new recipes added as part of Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Storybook Vale. Some of the new recipes are as follows, along with what materials are required for crafting them.

Fountain of Thebes

  • Five Pure Ice
  • Five Star Sapphires
  • Two Volcanic Rock
  • Five Sea Monster Teeth
  • 500 Storybook Magic

Transportation Table

  • One Pure Ice
  • Five Fairy Bubbles
  • 10 Iron Ingots
  • 10 Lightning Spice
  • 500 Storybook Magic

Crafting aside, Pure Ice has a chance to be a daily favorite item for a Disney character, which provides a significant boost to the next level. Finally, Pure Ice is one of the two favorite foods for one of the new critters in Storybook Vale, Dragons. In addition to Pure Ice, Dragons also like to eat Magma. In order to feed them, you must approach them and wait for them to stop cowering before you can feed them.

item.title: STALKER 2: Heart Of Chornobyl - All Assault Rifles, Ranked
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Assault rifles are versatile and common in STALKER 2 , with unique variants and stats.
  • Choose weapons based on their accuracy, range, and damage capabilities in-game.
  • Different assault rifles have varying reliabilities, upgrades, and tactical advantages.

STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl , the newest entry in the beloved STALKER franchise, has finally been released. As players take to The Zone in order to recover mysterious, otherworldly artifacts, they will encounter the many dangers, both human and inhuman, that dwell within. As a result, it is important that they have the right equipment, with weaponry in particular being of critical importance.

Though there are several factors that can affect a weapon's performance, such as degradation and attachments, each weapon in the game does come with a set of base statistics and there are some considerable differences between them. Assault rifles are the most common weapon type found throughout STALKER 2 and also the most versatile. Whether clearing buildings or fighting at range, assault rifles tend to have all bases covered, and a variety of unique rifles can also be found throughout the game with their own enhanced stats.

9 AKM-74U

A Basic Survivor's Weapon, Weak Vs Mutants

Weight

2.72 KG

Caliber

5.45x39

Magazine Size

30

The AKM-47U is a relatively common and weak assault rifle found throughout the game, most often on the bodies of lower-level enemies. While it can hold its own against some unarmored human enemies, it will really struggle against even the most basic mutants.

Though several upgrades can make the gun better, it is best kept as a backup for more powerful weapons. Reliability can also be an issue for the AKM-47U, but luckily, a replacement is going to be very easy to find.

8 AR416

A Weak But Accurate AR With Unique Variants

Weight

4.56 KG

Caliber

5.56x45

Magazine Size

30

The AR416 is a more substantial weapon with a noticeable increase in accuracy. While it might not have the greatest stopping power, the AR416 is still decent enough for an assault rifle and will serve players well in the early game.

There are several unique variations of the AR416 throughout the game, each with improved stats and attachments. The Unknown Stalker's AR416 can be obtained by completing the "Poppy Field" quest, while the AR416 Monolith can be purchased with the Deluxe Edition DLC.

7 Grom S-14

A Solid AR With A Variety of Uses

Weight

3.98 KG

Caliber

9x39

Magazine Size

20

The Grom S-14 is a considerable step up when compared with weaker assault rifles, offering high accuracy, range, and penetration, as well as marginally increased damage. This rifle can be bought from the trader, Wreck, in Yaniv Station.

With a few upgrades, the Grom S-14 can easily carry players through the mid-game, but its style might not be suited to everyone, and its small mag capacity makes full auto mode a big risk. If found, a Grom S-14 can be sold for up to 24,814 Coupons.

6 AS Lavina

A Powerful Silenced Rifle Ideal Against Human Enemies

Weight

2.78 KG

Caliber

9x39

Magazine Size

20

The AS Lavina is a very solid assault rifle with a focus on penetration and accuracy. It can be obtained either from Wreck at Yaniv Station, or from Death Cave in the Cordon region. If looking for the weapon in Death Cave, keep in mind that it will likely be guarded by a Controller Mutant.

The AS Lavina also has a unique variant, the SA-U Gabion , which is included in the Deluxe Edition DLC and has improved stats as well as several useful attachments. Overall, it makes for an excellent mid-range weapon, particularly against human enemies.

5 Fora-221

A Strong Rifle With Great Upgrade Potential

Weight

3.82 KG

Caliber

5.45x39

Magazine Size

30

The Fora-221 is one of the stronger assault rifles in STALKER 2 , and it has some of the highest accuracy out of any assault rifle in the game. The rifle is most commonly found as a drop from stronger, well-armed enemies such as Ward Soldiers.

Though it may suffer from its poor durability, often requiring repairs and risking jamming at crucial moments, when it does work it is a brilliant and efficient weapon — especially in semi-auto. A unique variant of the Fora-221, Lullaby , can be obtained by unlocking the Chemical Plant region as part of the main story, and is found in a Journalist Stash in the Army Warehouse.

4 AKM-74S

A Strong But Common Weapon With Several Unique Variants

Weight

3.82 KG

Caliber

5.45x39

Magazine Size

30

The AKM-74S is a mid-level assault rifle found by defeating reasonably armed enemies such as ISPF guards. With slightly above-average damage, the AKM-74S can hold its own against some smaller mutants, and should have little trouble taking down lighter-armed human enemies as well.

The AKM-74S is known for its reliability and will degrade at a slightly slower rate than some other weapons. Several unique variations of the AKM-74S can be found throughout the game, including Valik Lummox's AKM-74S, the Drowned variant, and the Combatant variant.

3 GP37

A Highly Accurate Long Range Rifle

Weight

3.96 KG

Caliber

5.56x45

Magazine Size

30

This lightweight German assault rifle is arguably the most accurate rifle in the game, and can be found in the Plant Boiler Station area of the Garbage region. Though it lacks the power of some other ARs, the GP37 makes up for it with supreme accuracy, range, and penetration.

This weapon also comes with a scope equipped as standard, though further enhancements can also be made. The GP37 makes for an ideal main weapon, particularly when faced with tougher enemies, including mutants.

2 Dnipro

An Excellent General-Purpose AR Good In All Areas

Weight

3.73 KG

Caliber

5.45x39

Magazine Size

30

The Dnipro is an elite-tier Special Forces rifle with exceptional accuracy and penetration relative to other assault rifles. It can be purchased for a high price from Wreck at Yaniv Station, or will occasionally be found on higher-level enemies and dead Stalkers.

With a relatively lightweight and compact design, the Dnipro can be great as a secondary weapon for those who may prefer sniper rifles or other weapon types, but it is more than powerful enough to serve as a primary weapon too.

1 Kharod

A Supremely Powerful Elite Rifle With Unrivaled Base Stats

Weight

4.16 KG

Caliber

5.56x45

Magazine Size

30

The Kharod is the strongest of the AR models in the game and, as a result, is also one of the most valuable as well. With high damage, penetration, and accuracy, the Kharod is ideal for mid-to-long-range confrontations and will be effective against both humans and mutants.

On top of its inventory advantages and overall performance, the Kharod can also be upgraded with various powerful accessories. If brought to a vendor, a Kharod in good condition can fetch up to 27,697 Coupons.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3: 8 Best Mods For The Fighter Class
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Fighter Unleashed mod lets players experience BG3 as a one-person army, providing balanced yet easier gameplay.
  • Samurai subclass mod adds grounded flavor to combat, enhancing player variety without straying from BG3's spirit.
  • Shields Overhaul mod makes shields more effective by reducing incoming damage directly, improving combat viability.

Baldur's Gate 3 is doubtlessly one of the most impactful games of all time. By sales alone, it has reached a colossal audience, and it continues to impress how much depth there is in a single title, honoring the legacy of CRPGs and D&D campaigns that have come before it.

Players and DMs alike have been taking inspiration from the game to work into their own campaigns, but like D&D proper, a little bit of homebrew never goes astray to help make this game feel more detailed and immersive. The Fighter class, often a mainstay for aggressive, front-on tactics, is already incredibly well-rounded, but these mods either directly or indirectly help enhance the fighter into an even more fearsome foe.

1 Fighter Unleashed

A Potent Reimagining Of The Fighter

  • Mod creator: Mharius
  • Mod link

The Fighter Unleashed is the perfect class for those who want to experience Baldur's Gate 3 as a one-person army. This mod is balanced, but absolutely makes the game easier, giving players fighter-based boons that most DMs wouldn't hand their players for free at gunpoint.

There is a subtler version that simply augments the existing fighter class, so no matter what players are after, the Fighter Unleashed mod has them covered. This is definitely a mod to check out if combat is something players want to coast through.

2 5e Rune Knight - Fighter Subclass

Adds The Iconic Subclass To BG3

  • Mod Creator: Sumradagnoth
  • Mod Link

Among some of the best fighter subclasses is the Rune Knight. Utilizing powerful giant runes, these knights get an excellent new layer of utility to any party, and the flavorful giant powers are another great feature.

Remaining as faithful to the 5e subclass as possible, this mod adds the Rune Knight as an option for players to undertake, and better still, includes compatibility for mods that take players up to level 20.

3 5e Samurai - Fighter Subclass

Embody The Fighting Spirit Of The Samurai

  • Mod Creator: Sumradagnoth
  • Mod Link

The Samurai was always an excellent choice for players wanting to take on a flavorful but inherently grounded subclass option for D&D. Many of the additional fighter subclasses had their powers in some way augmented with magic or other sources, but the Samurai is an implacable and fierce fighter with nothing but their sword and wits.

Like Sumradagnoth's other subclass mods, this is a faithful and mechanically friendly subclass mod that doesn't destroy the spirit of BG3, just adding in some more variety for players looking to change their playstyle.

4 Amakuni Katana

Powerful, Lore Friendly Katanas

  • Mod Creator: Sankojin
  • Mod Link

Many massive RPGs such as Elden Ring have embraced the katana, but BG3, adhering strictly to its fantasy aesthetic, seems to miss out on these graceful and powerful weapons. This mod adds several lovingly rendered katanas into the game.

Their implementation is immersive and lore-friendly, and the katanas are so well-rendered that even being outside the game's typical aesthetic doesn't make them feel out of place - this is a great mod that expands the Fighter's weapon variety, especially useful for those who use the above samurai mod.

5 The Treasure Trove - Weapons And Equipment

Affords Fighters A Huge Wealth Of Equipment

  • Mod Creator: Greyspectre
  • Mod Link

It's often said there's a martial caster disparity in D&D 5e - that Wizards grow too powerful at certain levels and leave martial classes like Fighters and Barbarians in the dust. This issue really does come down to what kind of table the DM is running, and it's not especially prevalent in BG3, but for those who feel the fighter needs an extra early boost, this is the mod for them.

This mod gives players the option to purchase a backpack filled with incredible pieces of weapons and armor, each in three tiers of rarity that denote their power. This means that those not looking to completely sully the spirit of the game can begin with the rare items and work their way up to legendary at their own pace.

6 Shields Overhaul

Makes Shields More Effective

  • Mod Creator: VitruvianGuar
  • Mod Link

Shields have always provided an impressive benefit to players who can utilize them in Baldur's Gate 3 , often Fighters or Paladins, but this mod makes shields more reactive and useful, without completely changing how combat works.

Shields now reduce incoming damage directly instead of just providing an AC buff, and there are plenty of ways to utilize new shield skills in combat, implemented by this mod, that make shields more viable than ever in any encounter.

7 5e Arcane Archer - Fighter Subclass

An Excellent New Specialization

  • Mod Creator: Sumradagnoth
  • Mod Link

Many games showcase archers as a thrilling and exciting tactical build, but in Baldur's Gate 3 , they're often lost in the shuffle of available options, with no subclasses really honing in on an archer build.

The Arcane Archer subclass mod changes this, giving Fighters an option to specialize further into archer and augment their arrows with magical power. This mod is a fair and balanced adaption of the 5e subclass for players to take on and still get an immersive BG3 experience.

8 Eldritch Knight Rework

Changes Up The Vanilla Subclass

  • Mod Creator: TRO
  • Mod Link

Rounding out the improvements for Fighters in BG3 is a fantastic Eldritch Knight rework that changes the way these arcane Fighters utilize both their swords and spells in battle. This mod enhances the class in an immersive and unobtrusive way.

Eldritch Knight now borrows minor features from other classes and subclasses to better enhance its utility. An early example of this is that the Eldritch Knight gains spell sculpting, an evocation wizard feature that allows allies to not be affected by AOE attacks.

item.title: COD: Black Ops 6 Guide - Best Loadouts, Zombies, Tips, & More
item.description:

    • Tips & Tricks

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 marks the twenty-first installment of the Call of Duty franchise and is the highly anticipated sequel to the acclaimed Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War . With big shoes to fill, Black Ops 6 has more than delivered, featuring a plethora of content in its three major modes, along with a seamless integration with the popular battle royale title, Call of Duty: Warzone . There's a lot to unpack with the colossal-sized game, along with hours of fun to be had.

Black Ops 6 is home to three unique experiences, each providing its own level of enjoyment. For those looking for an excellent story, the Campaign is the player's one-stop shop, providing a rich narrative set during the early '90s. For those simply looking to compete against other players around the world, Multiplayer will scratch that competitive itch. Finally, for long-time Zombie fans, the popular co-op mode returns to its roots with round-based Zombie action. There truly is a lot to discover in Black Ops 6 , and for those looking for guides on each major mode , this hub will prove remarkably useful. Here, find everything there is to know about Black Ops 6 , from the best meta loadouts and builds for Multiplayer to guides and walkthroughs for Campaign and Zombies.

  • Getting Started — Guides For Beginners

    Black Ops 6 introduces a plethora of new features and content for players to enjoy. From the debut of Omnimovement to the return of classic systems like Prestige, there’s plenty to unpack before diving into the game’s various modes. Whether it's learning how to earn Double XP Tokens or mastering the game’s movement system, our beginner guides on all things Black Ops 6 are sure to help fans smoothly get into everything the game has to offer.

  • Campaign Guides & Mission Walkthroughs

    The Campaign for Black Ops 6 throws players into a spy thriller set amidst the Gulf War of the early ’90s, featuring the return of fan-favorite characters like Frank Woods and Russell Adler. With fast-paced action and plenty of secrets to uncover, Black Ops 6’s Campaign is packed with blockbuster moments. Whether it's figuring out the hardest puzzles or unlocking free Weapon Blueprints, our complete Campaign Walkthrough is sure to get players up to speed with every mission.

    • Mission Walkthroughs

      Every Campaign Mission, Ranked

  • Best Loadouts & Weapon Guides

    Black Ops 6 Multiplayer may be the biggest installment yet, featuring Omnimovement, fast-paced action, and a variety of small-to-medium-sized maps. Much like every Call of Duty before it, Black Ops 6 also includes its own arsenal of weapons, each of which can be leveled up and customized for any occasion. From the best loadouts for every weapon available to ranking the top meta options in the game , our collection of weapon and loadout guides and lists provides players with the essential information needed to come out on top.

  • Zombies Guides & Walkthroughs

    Black Ops 6 marks the return of round-based Zombies, featuring two maps at launch: Terminus and Liberty Falls. In this thrilling co-op mode, players will battle against waves of the undead, upgrading their loadout and arsenal with weapons and Perks to better fend off the incoming horde. Aside from simply surviving rounds, each map also features main quests and other objectives to complete to progress through the story. Whether it’s learning how to get the latest Wonder Weapon or progressing through the main quest for each map, our complete Black Ops 6 Zombies Walkthrough provides players with everything they need to know.

item.title: Minecraft: How To Get Resin And Eyeblossom Flowers
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Get Resin In Minecraft
  • How To Get Eyeblossom Flowers In Minecraft

Minecraft’s Bundles of Bravery update has brought a lot of exciting content to the game. One of the major additions is the Pale Garden biome. This new area is home to many new materials. Among them are Resin and Eyeblossom Flowers.

Resin and Eyeblossom Flowers are pretty handy to have as they both have different uses in Minecraft. But, finding them can be tricky if you’re not sure where to look. This quick guide will show you how to find these resources in Minecraft and what they are used for.

How To Get Resin In Minecraft

Resin and Eyeblossom Flowers are both found in the Pale Garden biome , so the first thing you need to do is get to the Pale Garden. If you haven't found it yet, you can use a command to locate it. For more detailed help, players can check out our guide on how to find the Pale Garden biome.

To get your hands on Resin , Minecraft fans will need to attack the Creaking mob. This deadly mob was also introduced in Bundles of Bravery, and you can easily find it at night in Pale Garden .

Here’s the tricky part: it can’t be killed directly, no matter how powerful your weapon is. It’s spawned by a block called the Creaking Heart, so you’ll need to destroy that to get rid of the Creaking. Every time players attack it, resin will spawn on the tree it’s on . But, be careful not to get killed.

You can avoid its attacks by looking directly at it.

Resin’s bright orange color has quickly made it a favorite for many Minecraft players. It’s mainly used for decorative purposes, and you’ll also need it to craft a Creaking Heart.

How To Get Eyeblossom Flowers In Minecraft

Eyeblossom Flowers are pretty easy to find in the game. After reaching Pale Garden, look for these flowers on the ground and simply pick them up by hand . They’re everywhere, so you’ll find plenty.

Eyeblossom Flowers are a bit different from other flowers in Minecraft . This is because they are gray during the day and turn orange at night . So, if you pick them up during the day, they will give you gray dye, and if you harvest them at night, you’ll get orange dye. This can be done at a crafting bench . You can craft the dye at a crafting bench and use it to color your bundles or other items.
